mapper.select: select * from hall order by idx desc

select * from hall where hallType like '%'||#{hallType}||'%' and menuType like '%'||#{menuType}||'%'
and idx in (select hall_idx from hall_estimate where meal_price <= 30000 or meal_price2 <= 30000)
and idx in (select hall_idx from hall_estimate where meal_price >= 60000 or meal_price2 >= 60000)
and idx in (select hall_idx from hall_estimate where (meal_price between #{meal_price} and #{meal_price}+10000) or (meal_price2 between #{meal_price} and #{meal_price}+10000))
and idx in (select hall_idx from hall_estimate where est_guest<=100)
and idx in (select hall_idx from hall_estimate where est_guest>=300)
and idx in (select hall_idx from hall_estimate where est_guest between #{est_guest} and #{est_guest}+100)
select * from hall_estimate order by hall_idx desc
select * from hall order by accrue desc
select hall.idx,hall_estimate.hall_idx from hall,hall_estimate where hall.idx = hall_estimate.hall_idx
select distinct station from hall where line=#{line}
select * from hall where name like '%'||#{name}||'%'
